sources.name: ABC News
sources.description: Your trusted source for breaking news, analysis, exclusive interviews, headlines, and videos at ABCNews.com.

sources.name: Al Jazeera English
sources.description: News, analysis from the Middle East and worldwide, multimedia and interactives, opinions, documentaries, podcasts, long reads and broadcast schedule.

sources.name: Ars Technica
sources.description: The PC enthusiast's resource. Power users and the tools they love, without computing religion.

sources.name: Associated Press
sources.description: The AP delivers in-depth coverage on the international, politics, lifestyle, business, and entertainment news.

sources.name: Axios
sources.description: Axios are a new media company delivering vital, trustworthy news and analysis in the most efficient, illuminating and shareable ways possible.

sources.name: Bleacher Report
sources.description: Sports journalists and bloggers covering NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, MMA, college football and basketball, NASCAR, fantasy sports and more. News, photos, mock drafts, game scores, player profiles and more!

sources.name: Bloomberg
sources.description: Bloomberg delivers business and markets news, data, analysis, and video to the world, featuring stories from Businessweek and Bloomberg News.

sources.name: Breitbart News
sources.description: Syndicated news and opinion website providing continuously updated headlines to top news and analysis sources.

sources.name: Business Insider
sources.description: Business Insider is a fast-growing business site with deep financial, media, tech, and other industry verticals. Launched in 2007, the site is now the largest business news site on the web.

sources.name: Buzzfeed
sources.description: BuzzFeed is a cross-platform, global network for news and entertainment that generates seven billion views each month.

sources.name: CBS News
sources.description: CBS News: dedicated to providing the best in journalism under standards it pioneered at the dawn of radio and television and continue in the digital age.
